math.What is the Pythagorean theorem?: In a right-angled triangle, the square of the hypotenuse is equal to the sum of the squares of the other two sides. (a² + b² = c²)
math.What is derivative of x^2?: The derivative of x² with respect to x is 2x.

science.What is photosynthesis?: Photosynthesis is the process by which green plants use sunlight, water, and carbon dioxide to produce glucose and oxygen.
science.What is Newton's first law?: An object will remain at rest, or in uniform motion in a straight line, unless acted upon by an external force.
science.What is the boiling point of water?: At standard atmospheric pressure, water boils at 100°C (212°F).

programming.What is a variable?: A variable is a named storage that holds data which can be changed during program execution.
programming.What is a function?: A function is a reusable block of code that performs a specific task when called.
programming.What is an array?: An array is a data structure that stores multiple values in a single variable, accessible by an index.
